text: LUCASFILM Ltd
"Dark screen, text fainting."
original_texts: Dark screen with faint, barely discernible text 'LUCASFILM' at the center.

text: Rey stands in a vast desert landscape, dressed in her signature beige outfit under cloudy sky with rocks far off.
original_texts: Rey stands in a vast desert landscape, dressed in her signature beige outfit with a lightsaber at her side. The terrain is barren with distant rock formations under a cloudy sky.

text: "Rey determined; reaches down her belt and grips her blaster pistol firmly."
original_texts: The camera slowly zooms in on Rey's face, emphasizing her determined expression.
Rey reaches down to adjust her belt.

text: EVERY GENERATION HAS A LEGEND
A sandy desert landscape unfolds, fine sand swirling across the screen. The camera pans to rocky outcroppings in the distance as Rey charges across the desert, a weapon in hand.
original_texts: A sandy desert landscape is shown, with fine sand particles blowing across the screen.
The camera pans over the desert, showing rocky outcroppings in the distance.
Rey is seen running across the desert, holding a weapon in one hand.

text: "Rey sprints with blue saber, speeder bike kicks up dust."
original_texts: Rey, holding a blue lightsaber, sprints across a vast desert landscape under a partly cloudy sky.
In the distance, a speeder bike runs across the sand, kicking up dust behind it.

text: "Rey flips with blue saber over bike."
original_texts: Rey leaps into the air with her blue lightsaber ignited, performing an acrobatic flip over a speeder bike racing through a desert landscape.

text: THIS CHRISTMAS
Starry space background.
Blue lights flicker in rock shadows, eerie glow.
original_texts: Bright blue lights emerge from the shadows of the rocks, casting an eerie glow across the scene. These lights flicker intermittently, adding a sense of mystery and foreboding.

text: "Kylo Ren charges with his red lightsaber ignited, amidst burning trees and smoke-filled air."
original_texts: Kylo Ren charges forward aggressively with red lightsaber ignited, as he lunges toward opponents amidst burning trees and smoke-filled air.

text: Red droid, dim light. Finn outside, group behind. BB-8 in dark room. Cockpit, space view. Lando focused. Hyperspace shot.
original_texts: A droid with a red glowing light on its head is seen in a dimly lit environment.
The camera shifts to show Finn standing outdoors near rocky terrain with others in the background.
BB-8 and another spherical droid are inside a dark, cluttered room with various equipment around them.
The cockpit of a spacecraft is shown with characters seated inside, looking out at space.
A close-up of Lando Calrissian wearing a headset, appearing focused and intense.
The view transitions to a spaceship traveling through hyperspace.

text: THE SAGA COMES TO AN END
"Desert blast, C-3PO with gun, sparks."
original_texts: An explosion erupts in a desert landscape with rocky formations and ancient pillars.
C-3PO, a golden droid, appears to be leaning against a vehicle, holding a weapon, while sparks fly around him.

text: A golden medallion with intricate designs.
Rey embraces another warmly.
Rey, Finn, and Poe stand in a field, looking ahead.
"Rey walks towards the edge of a cliff, facing a stormy sea."
original_texts: Rey as she walks towards the edge of a cliff, facing a stormy sea.
